p0: You can use <1>/write</1> for taking notes and sharing them with your group in real time.
p1: Write, edit, and read collaboratively and discuss written text with by marking it and adding comments. Simply create a new pad with a random name, or manually define a name for your pad, and share your unique link with others.
p2: All your changes are backed up by a feature called timeslider, which shows all changes made to the document over time.
